name: Arsenal Sanity Shield
tagline: Hide the football internet after a bad result
description:
Losing hurts. What makes it worse is opening a browser and immediately getting dunked on — headlines, hot takes, fan reactions, YouTube thumbnails with crying faces. Arsenal Sanity Shield makes it stop.

Install it, forget it. When Arsenal lose or draw, the extension detects the result and quietly hides football content across the web — articles, YouTube channels, social posts. When they win, everything's back to normal.

Built the free version for Arsenal fans. The premium tier (Football Sanity Shield) extends it to any English club across six competitions.

changes.text: Arsenal Sanity Shield — free tier tracking Arsenal in PL and Champions League
Content blocking across all sites when Arsenal lose or draw
YouTube channel blocking by ID and handle (AFTV, Rory Talks Arsenal, and more)
60+ Arsenal keyword list covering players, hashtags, and club names
Vercel backend API with secret validation and 30-minute edge cache
Animated loading spinner during match polls
Auto-refresh via Chrome storage listener — popup updates without reload
Football Sanity Shield (premium) — any English club, 6 competitions, options page, club picker
Rows hiding for clubs not in knockout competitions
Knockout competition visibility for non-qualifying clubs
